name: Rhem 3: The Secret Library
description:
EXPLORE THE LATEST IN THE "RHEM" SERIES LEGACY.
Explore the Intricate Worlds of RHEM with this New Release!

The adventures of brothers Kales and Zetais continue in this fascinating first-person 3D adventure set in a labyrinthine world of hidden rooms and secret passages, strange vehicles and odd machines.

In search of a powerful black gem, you uncover hints hidden in a secret library, and ponder clues offered by the peculiar inhabitants of the mysterious land of RHEM who assist you in your quest.

With an adventurous spirit, logical thinking, and keen puzzle-solving, you will slowly but surely unearth the location of this curious treasure and unveil the secret it holds!
